content:
Hi! There is two blocking issues to get Live++ a very useful tool in the game dev community working for rust. Stephan Reinalter the author of Live++ tweeted this https://twitter.com/molecularmusing/status/1466397773339758592. One of my team mates is the author of the LLVM patches. Was wondering if there is someone here that can help push this forward?

Rustaceans, #rustlang & #llvm folks: I dabbled around with #rust a bit, and if somebody can land the LF_BUILDINFO (https://reviews.llvm.org/D80833) and S_OBJNAME (https://reviews.llvm.org/D43002) changes into main LLVM, I'm confident I could use that to build LiveRust - hot-reload for Rust!

- Stefan Reinalter (@molecularmusing)
